choices: Harvest moon: A wonderful life door

115.content:
You don't know why but you couldn't force yourself to open these set of doors. Still walking down the hall you come across another set of doors.

"Ok I really need to get out of here." You thought knowing by now the shop must be near closing time. You take another deep breath in and open..
115.title: More door.

12.content: you choose the movie door but which movie
12.title: a movie

14.content: why not from a comic book...
14.title: a comic

info.brief_description: Pick a world and help save it!
info.description:
Your a regular person walking around and one day end up in a place where you can pick a world that's in trouble.

Rules
1) Sex is allowed as a reward for rescue only
2) You are NOT the main character (This is similar to my other story)
3) No ending the storylines. Once a place ice rescued, You go to chose a other world.
4) Death is allowed only to the bad guys. All Heros/Heroines or other main characters may not die.
5) Have Fun!
